about_the_game:
Uh-Oh! It looks like the government has cloned your ridiculous yet strong-willed peanut mercenary team for evil purposes! Take them down in game modes such as Free for All, Team Nutmatch, and Bomb Rush. Are you ready for a NutShot?

NutShot is a free online fast-paced multiplayer peanut shooter.

THE GANG
Pick between 8 different classes all with unique abilities and personalities.

UPGRADE YOUR HEAT
Collect and find custom weapons then level them up to customize your dream gun. Want a faster fire rate, quicker reload, exploding bullets? The choice is yours.

PLAY YOUR WAY
Create custom games and change the rulesets to fit your desired playstyle, great with friends!

CLIMB THE RANKS
Climb the ranks in all competitive game modes and make your presence known on the global leaderboards.

name: NutShot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 or 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: NutShot is a stylized, fast-paced, movement-based, high-stakes, arena FPS that's all about moving fast. Speed through arenas by jumping, diving, sliding, grappling, and more. Let the best peanut win.
